import { memo, useState } from 'react' import './ProfileLayout.scss' import EditProfileIcon from '../../images/editUser.png' import HistoryBookingIcon from '../../images/historyBooking.png' import Avatar1 from '../../images/avatar1.png' function ProfileLayout() { const [avatar, setAvatar] = useState() return (
) } export default memo(ProfileLayout)
